name: CO-STAR Framework Template
content:
# CO-STAR Prompt Framework

## Context
[Provide relevant background information about the situation or problem. What does the AI need to know about the scenario?]

## Objective
[Clearly define the specific task or goal you want the AI to accomplish. What exact outcome are you seeking?]

## Style
[Specify the writing style you want the AI to use (e.g., academic, conversational, like a specific expert or personality)]

## Tone
[Define the attitude or emotional context for the response (e.g., formal, enthusiastic, professional, humorous)]

## Audience
[Identify who will be reading or using this response (e.g., technical experts, beginners, children, executives)]

## Response Format
[Specify exactly how you want the response structured (e.g., bullet points, step-by-step guide, JSON format, essay, code)]

---

[Your specific query or request here]
description: A comprehensive prompt structure based on the CO-STAR framework (Context, Objective, Style, Tone, Audience, Response). This template helps create well-structured prompts that generate more precise and useful AI responses.
